attributes.action: Make sanitary products free for women
attributes.additional_details: They are a big essential and some people struggle to afford these especially if they are on a low income. Some people go without sanitary products and just use tissue instead of being able to buy pads and tampons
attributes.background: Make all sanitary products for women free as they are a major essential

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555551
